name: Platblue Beats
description:
New very cool rhythm game for PC!

In this game, you dodge the attacks that appears in the beat.

You move using left and right arrow (by default)

and jump (dodge) using space (by default)

Not enough songs? More songs will be added in future....

But you can also get more custom songs online or make your own!


Game home page: azapru.github.io/platbluebeats

#arcade #retro #other #rhythm #platblue #MadeWithFusion
